p.k: Classic, Art, Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Romance, Thriller Uk (1936). Hrají: Madeleine Carroll, John Gielgud, Peter Lorre, Robert Young. Režie: Alfred Hitchcock.
p.d: After three British agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.
